SamPy.cos.COSNUVCalib.get_NUV_PSA_WCA¶

SamPy.cos.COSNUVCalib.get_NUV_PSA_WCA(psalist, wcalist, scale=False, width=512, ishift=1, extrakeys=False, debug=False)¶

Does a cross-correlation between a pair of x1d files containing the PSA and WCA spectra for the same central wavelegth.

input: psalist - a list containing filenames of the x1d spectra for the PSA wcalist - a list containing filenames of the x1d spectra for the WCA

optional input: scale - whether wca spectrum is multiplied with boxcar smoothing factor of the

ratio between psa and wca spectrum

ishift - guess of the intial shift in pixels, int width - width of the search area in pixels, int returns: a list with central wavelengths, stripes, and calculated offset values.
